about_the_game:
You are playing as Patrick - Jamie's best friend. Growing up next door was fun and full of happy memories. But something has changed since you reached 18 years old. Suddenly you started to notice how beautiful Jamie is and you often catch yourself daydreaming of her body.

However Jamie sees you only as a friend. All those years built a strong foundation for friendship and Jamie is very comfortable with you. It almost feels like she is a sister that you never had. It is particularly hard for you to be in a friend zone and you don't even know how to talk to her about it. So you never did.
Until one day Jamie went on a date with somebody else...

You are both adults living upper midtown. Jamie went on a date with Dereck, a guy that she met online and apparently likes a lot. Later next day Jamie unexpectedly called you at 2AM and asked to meet her at her place. You noticed strange tones in her voice. Was she crying?

You are on your way to Jamie's, feeling nervous and anxious...

content_descriptors.notes:
Game starts with soft erotic animations and progresses into cg sex scenes as story develops.
Full nudity. All characters are fictional.

detailed_description:
You are playing as Patrick - Jamie's best friend. Growing up next door was fun and full of happy memories. But something has changed since you reached 18 years old. Suddenly you started to notice how beautiful Jamie is and you often catch yourself daydreaming of her body.

However Jamie sees you only as a friend. All those years built a strong foundation for friendship and Jamie is very comfortable with you. It almost feels like she is a sister that you never had. It is particularly hard for you to be in a friend zone and you don't even know how to talk to her about it. So you never did.
Until one day Jamie went on a date with somebody else...

You are both adults living upper midtown. Jamie went on a date with Dereck, a guy that she met online and apparently likes a lot. Later next day Jamie unexpectedly called you at 2AM and asked to meet her at her place. You noticed strange tones in her voice. Was she crying?

You are on your way to Jamie's, feeling nervous and anxious...
name: For the love of Jamie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A beautiful, choice-driven visual novel. Navigate Patrick's adult life and make choices that affect his friendship and relationships. This game has multiple endings.
